long_description: The Cannondale CAAD10 6 compact women's road bike delivers a race-ready alternative to carbon frames thanks to a responsive aluminum frame tweaked to perfection, plus Shimano 105 components. 6069 aluminum CAAD10 frame offers responsive stiffness with impressive weight savings that rivals some carbon frames. Butted and shaped seatstays and chainstays help reduce side-to-side flex for energy efficiency while also helping make bumps and road vibrations less jarring. Lightweight all-carbon fork supplies great road performance, slicing through corners and damping road vibrations; tapered steerer enhances stiffness and responsiveness. Sturdy Shimano 105 derailleurs and shifters offer precise, dependable shifts throughout the 20 gear combinations. FSA Omega crankset is paired with a 12 - 30 tooth cassette for a highly capable gear range, letting you spin comfortably no matter the gradient. BB30 bottom bracket design improves stiffness and increases power efficiency at a critical point on the bike. Shimano RS-10 wheelset is decked out with fast Schwalbe Lugano folding tires for excellent handling and speed. Pedals sold separately. Cannondale CAAD10 6 compact women's road bike specs are subject to change.
short_description: The Cannondale CAAD10 6 compact women's road bike delivers a race-ready alternative to carbon frames thanks to a responsive aluminum frame tweaked to perfection, plus Shimano 105 components.
